column1: Pick an event that contains the SAME PATTERN as your main topic but in a different context:
- Must be from a different time period (at least 20+ years ago)

- Main topic: Index fund risk → Historical story: Nifty Fifty stocks crash (1970s)
- Main topic: Crypto volatility → Historical story: Tulip mania (1630s) or South Sea Bubble (1720)
- Main topic: Real estate speculation → Historical story: 2008 housing crisis or Japanese asset bubble (1980s)
- Main topic: Corporate debt → Historical story: Enron collapse (2001) or Mexico debt crisis (1982)
- Main topic: Bank manipulation → Historical story: LIBOR scandal (2012) or London Gold Pool (1960s)

- Example: ""Let me tell you about Mexico in 1982. The government had borrowed billions in US dollars
